name: ʻAlenuihāhā
description: ʻAlenuihāhā is a sativa-dominant hybrid by Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakalōlō Seed Bank named after the sea channel that separates the Kona side of the Big Island and the island of Maui. By blending Kona Gold and Maui Wowie, ʻAlenuihāhā achieves an uplifted and happy stimulation that doesn’t overclock the consumer’s heart or mind. This strain’s healthy yield and consistently positive effects make it a delightful and inspiring choice for consumers seeking relief from depression and fatigue.
descriptionPlain: ʻAlenuihāhā is a sativa-dominant hybrid by Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakalōlō Seed Bank named after the sea channel that separates the Kona side of the Big Island and the island of Maui. By blending Kona Gold and Maui Wowie, ʻAlenuihāhā achieves an uplifted and happy stimulation that doesn’t overclock the consumer’s heart or mind. This strain’s healthy yield and consistently positive effects make it a delightful and inspiring choice for consumers seeking relief from depression and fatigue.

highlightedReviews.text:
ʻAlenuihāhā  is the sea channel that separates the Kona side of the Big Island of Hawai'i from the lush magical island of Maui.

Our genetic specialists here at Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakalōlō Seed Bank found it the only fitting name to use when we bred our juiciest Maui Wowie mother with a stank diesel fuel reeking Kona Gold to create our most 'ono (delicious) Pakalolo masterpiece yet: ʻAlenuihāhā

A perfect blend of two of the most legendary Hawaiian Sativa strains of all time, ʻAlenuihāhā has the sweet uplifting tropical effect we all love from her Maui Wowie Mother paired with the potent punch from a heavy yielding Kona Gold Hawaiian heritage.

A delightfully inspirational experience similar to sailing the Hawaiian channel for which she was named, Alenuihaha is one of our favorite new HI hybrids here at Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakalōlō Seed Bank.

A project close to our hearts, ʻAlenuihāhā has been under development for the past two years and will be ready for release by Christmas 2016. Mele Kalikimaka

Aloha a hui hou,
Pua Mana 'Ohana

This strain is da one to grow outdoors in HI. Maui Wowie is from wet lush Hana side and Kona Gold is from dry sunny Kona side. Their child is ready to rage in any microclimate in Hawai'i. She smells of sweet tropical flowers and hits with Hawaiian power.
